title: Harvey Foundation, Mike Tyson, Ahmaud Arbery, Family Feud and more.
itunes:title: Harvey Foundation, Mike Tyson, Ahmaud Arbery, Family Feud and more.
description:
Good morning and welcome to the ride! We in vivid color this morning and the crew is different! How you doin'? The CLO helps a young woman make a life decision. The Virtual Monday Mentoring with Steve is doing big things. Mike Tyson still got it! The autopsy for Ahmaud Arbery had some stunning revelations. Family Feud in Africa can be seen on YouTube. The number of COVID-19 passes the 85K mark. The crew tells us an item that they can't do without. Today in Closing Remarks, Steve has become an expert in the I don't see how and explains it right here.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
